
{{alias}}( k, λ )
    Returns the differential entropy of an Erlang distribution (in nats).

    If provided `NaN` as any argument, the function returns `NaN`.

    If not provided a nonnegative integer for `k`, the function returns `NaN`.

    If provided a non-positive value for `λ`, the function returns `NaN`.

    Parameters
    ----------
    k: integer
        Shape parameter.

    λ: number
        Rate parameter.

    Returns
    -------
    out: number
        Entropy.

    Examples
    --------
    > var v = {{alias}}( 1, 1.0 )
    ~-0.154
    > v = {{alias}}( 4, 12.0 )
    ~9.587
    > v = {{alias}}( 8, 2.0 )
    ~33.973

    See Also
    --------
